member.name: REASSIGN_BLOCKS_EX
member.summary: Contains disk block reassignment data. This is a variable length structure where the last member is an array of block numbers to be reassigned. It is used by theIOCTL_DISK_REASSIGN_BLOCKS_EX control code.

member.name: REASSIGN_BLOCKS_EX.Reserved
member.summary: This member is reserved. Do not use it. Set it to 0 (zero).

summary.para: The number of blocks to be reassigned.
This is the number of elements that are in theBlockNumber member array.

member.name: REASSIGN_BLOCKS_EX.BlockNumber
member.summary: An array of Count block numbers, one for each block to be reassigned.
